verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: North Korea 's vice foreign minister Kim Kye Gwan] [V: said] [ARG1: the North is open to resolving issues with the United States whenever and however after U.S. President Donald Trump called off a June summit with its leader , Kim Jong Un.</p >]

< p > North Korea 's vice foreign minister Kim Kye Gwan said [ARG1: the North] [V: is] [ARG2: open to resolving issues with the United States whenever and however after U.S. President Donald Trump called off a June summit with its leader , Kim Jong Un.</p >]

< p > North Korea 's vice foreign minister Kim Kye Gwan said [ARG0: the North] is open to [V: resolving] [ARG1: issues with the United States] [ARGM-TMP: whenever and however after U.S. President Donald Trump called off a June summit with its leader , Kim Jong Un.</p >]

< p > North Korea 's vice foreign minister Kim Kye Gwan said the North is open to resolving issues with the United States whenever and however after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: called] off [ARG1: a June summit with its leader , Kim Jong Un.</p >]
